law.catch_line: Personalty insufficient, land may be sold.
law.text: If there is not enough personal property, the officer may levy on land at the same time and sell a sufficiency thereof to satisfy the execution.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1693.
